name: ambit-jsx
description: Ambit cheminformatics services JavaScript communication client

scripts.test: rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.js test/libs && rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.css test/libs && rsync node_modules/lodash/lodash.js test/libs && rsync node_modules/as-sys/as-sys.js test/libs && rsync node_modules/commbase-jsx/commbase-jsx.js test/libs && jasmine-node test
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm test && terser -mc --ie8 --keep-fnames -o ${npm_package_name}.min.js -- $npm_package_main && chmod a-w $npm_package_name*.js && zip ${npm_package_main}.zip LICENSE ./$npm_package_name*.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git tag -am "Release $npm_package_version." ${npm_package_version} && git push --tags
